snippet: From 1998 to 2001, Kozmo.com offered free delivery within an hour. Now, some online merchants and their delivery partners are inching back toward that vision.
abstract: Randall Stross Digital Domain column observes that some online retailers and their delivery service partners are trying out same-day service for a fee in some cities; notes United States Postal Service will experiment with its same-day Metro Post service in San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: From 1998 to 2001, Kozmo.com offered free delivery within an hour. Now, some online merchants and their delivery partners are inching back toward that vision.

headline.seo: Online Merchants Again Pursue Same-Day Delivery Service
headline.main: A Race Against the Clock, Again, in Package Delivery
headline.print_headline: A Race Against the Clock, Again, in Package Delivery
